meanings.definition: A slang term for friends or acquaintances.
meanings.sent1: My okes and I are going to the park.
meanings.sent2: I always have a great time hanging out with my okes.
meanings.sent3: I asked my okes to help me with my homework, and we ended up having a fun study session.
meanings.sent4: Even though we argue sometimes, my okes are like family to me.
meanings.sent5: The bond between me and my okes is unbreakable.

meanings.definition: To agree or be in accordance with something.
meanings.sent1: I okes with your plan to go to the movies.
meanings.sent2: She always okes with her friends' decisions.
meanings.sent3: I okes with the idea of having pizza for dinner tonight.
meanings.sent4: His actions okes with his words, showing his honesty.
meanings.sent5: We need to okes on a time to meet for the project.

meanings.definition: A type of tree native to South Africa.
meanings.sent1: The okes in the park provide shade on sunny days.
meanings.sent2: The okes in the forest are tall and majestic.
meanings.sent3: I saw a squirrel climbing one of the okes in the garden.
meanings.sent4: The okes swayed gently in the breeze, creating a peaceful atmosphere.
meanings.sent5: The leaves of the okes rustled softly in the wind.
